task:
POLISH: Interdimensional Radio - README Rewrite for Normies

Rewrite the README to be accessible to non-technical users.

CURRENT: Technical, developer-focused
NEEDED: User-focused, benefit-driven

STRUCTURE:
1. Hero section: What it does (3 sentences max)
2. Video/GIF demo embed
3. 'Get Started in 5 Minutes' (not setup instructions - EXPERIENCE instructions)
4. Features with screenshots
5. FAQ (Is it really free? Does it work offline? etc.)
6. Technical details HIDDEN in collapsible section

TO
